How we work together?

Here are the overview of how we will work together with your tech team when you choose our service.

You signup for the service and get the require access to demand mamangement tools.

1.

Signup & Agreement

Access to Tools & Systems
1-2 Days

Submit Design Files

Set priority for each screen
4-5 Days

2.

Once you signup you can share your designs files to our team with setting each screen's priority for UI development. So that we can deliver each screen one after another.

We deliver UI code with localisation and accessiblity support and your devs can start integrating those UI into project.

3.

UI code delivery

Devs can integrate UI code into project
till all UI delivered

Support for Bug fixes & Deprecated APIs

You will get support for bug fixes and deprecated APIs for all supported devices

4.

We will keep sharing updated UI code with all bug fixes and deprecated APIs changes for all supported devices.
